Condition Variable in .NET Framework

04-24-2020 #condition variable #.NET Framework #multi-thread #lock

Motivation

As a C++ programmer coming to the C# world, while writing multi-thread programs, the thing I miss the most is condition variable.

I googled for a while trying to find a built-in counterpart or a crafted solution in .NET Framework. I failed. The top results returned were either wrong statements, or a design that lacked generalization.
